Fitness support:

With special fitness support and

guidance from a team of coaches to accelerate the training process, in addition to being instructed in appropriate training methods, members are also guided on nutrition, analysis and training. In-depth body, exercise assessment to understand your body better, so that you can confidently achieve the desired model. Members can choose a personal trainer depending on their qualifications, strengths, and teaching ability to suit their training needs.

Nutrition:

Training with PT, you not only get training in physical exercises, but they also learn about nutrition and the ability of nutrition to affect the training process. You are guided on how to eat and choose foods to achieve your goals in the fastest and most effective way.

Benefits of working out with a personal trainer:

– You will receive detailed workout support that corresponds to your needs and abilities.
– You will have a companion to encourage and help you overcome difficult moments.
– You will have separate exercises and exercise regimes.

Working hard is not equal to practicing right, because if you practice wrong, it is not only ineffective, but also easy to cause injury and affect health. If you practice on your own, sometimes you may make some mistakes after training that makes the exercise no longer effective.

If you hire a personal trainer, it will give you a very high motivation to exercise. The fact that you have a personal trainer will not be like your usual workout just choosing equipment and practicing. Your personal trainer will be responsible for monitoring your training closely, even if you don’t have a training schedule, it will not be easy for you to practice self-measurement to ensure safety and health effective.

The team of personal trainers (PT) at The New Gym are fully equipped with knowledge as well as equipment to help you exercise most effectively, the personal trainers are enthusiastic, friendly and professional. The program is set up by the coach every day before teaching, you will be tutored, motivated every day, making the practice no longer boring.

To schedule a workout with a personal trainer, you can book through the The New Gym app.

If you need more infomation you can reach us at our Fanpage: The New Gym
